column4: hi, does any one know if it's possible to sync Google Reader with the Liferea RSS Client?
anyone?
Neither do I :(
Do you have it set to sync?
I don't use google reader
Just anything, not just GR
I've used lifearea (or whatever) before.  What do you mean "synced"  ?
Like synchronized with a server
Picking up feeds from another site.  I've done that before.  What's the issue?
It is so I can use multiple RSS Clients and have the read articles sync'd between them
I don't see anything about sync-ing with other RSS clients on that wiki page...
thats why
only certain Clients can do it and i was wondering if Liferea did so too
I'm not aware of any clients that do that.  I'm sure liferea keeps that information in the .lifearea folder in your /home
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NetNewsWire this is one that does sync and I use it, it works perfectly and i will see about that .liferea
Good luck.  I don't think I can offer any help
It said that there is no .liferea folder/file in my /home folder
.liferea_1.4   ?
I found something
Thanks though!
No problem!
